summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5408 for the improvement of 42nd Avenue West, from West Barrett Street to West Armour Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 67415, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
